data.eml:eml: Squalius namak, a new chub from Lake Namak basin in Iran (Teleostei: Cyprinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khaefi, Roozbehan, Esmaeili, Hamid Reza, Sayyadzadeh, Golnaz, Geiger, Matthias F., Freyhof, Jörg (2016): Squalius namak, a new chub from Lake Namak basin in Iran (Teleostei: Cyprinidae). Zootaxa 4169 (1): 145-159, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4169.1.7
